titleStmt.title: SII 3.153: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 153.—ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE SAME TEMPLE. No. 73 of 1898.

summary.p: This record registers another transaction of the assembly with regard to certain lands of the Lord of Vṛindāvana (i.e., Kṛishṇa) in Uttaramēru-chaturvēdimaṅgalam in the 3rd year of Pārthivēndrādhipativarman, ‘who took the head of Pāṇḍya’.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī .. pāṇṭiyaṉai talaikoṇṭaRead pārtthivendrātipativarmaṟku. pārātthivetrārātipativanmaṟ
kku yāṇṭu muṉṟāvatu kāliyūrkoṭṭattu taṉkūṟṟu Uttarameruccatu
rvvetimaṅkalattu peruṅkuṟisabhaiyom Eḻuttu Emmur śrīvirun=tā
vaṇattuRead vaṉattu. perumāṉ AṭṭiyaḷukkuRead aṭikaḷukku.
śrībalikkum tirucceṉṉaṭaikkum nandāviḷakkukkum Arccanābhogattukkumāka vaitta bhūmiyāvatu śrīdevivāykkālaṉRead vāykkāliṉ. teṟku nālāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟup pallavanāraṇavatikkukRead kiḻakku. kiḻārkup patiṉoṉṟāRead patiṉoṉṟāñcatu. ccatukkattum paṉṉi
raṇṭāñ catukkattumākat talait taraṅ kuḻi nānūṟṟeṇpatu kuḻiyum śrīdevivāykkāliṉ teṟku nālāṅ kaṇṇāṟup pallavaṉāraṉRead ṉāraṇa. vatiyiṉ kiḻakku Oṉpatāñ catukkattut talaitaraṅkuḻiCancel the word taraṅkuḻi which is repeated by mistake. taraṅkuḻi nānūṟṟu Aimpattāṟu kuḻiyum śrīde- vivākThe inscription stops here.

(Line 1.) Hail ! Prosperity ! In the 3rd year of Pārthivēndrādhipativarman, who took the head of the Pāṇḍya (king), (this is) the writing of us (the members) of the great assembly of Uttaramēru-chaturvēdimaṅgalam in its own subdivision in Kāliyūrkōṭṭam. The following are the lands given to the lord of (the temple of) the glorious Vṛindāvana of our village for śrībali, sacred current expenses, perpetual lamp and archchanābhōga:—

(L. 5.) 480 kuḻi of first rate (land) in the eleventh and twelfth squares (śadukkam) (situated) to the east of (the path called) Pallavanāraṇa-vadi in the fourth kaṇṇāṟu to the south of (the channel called) Śrīdēvi-vāykkāl; 456 kuḻi of first rate (land) in the ninth square (situated) to the east of (the path called) Pallavanāraṇa-vadi in the fourth kaṇṇāṟu to the south of (the channel called) Śrīdēvi-vāykkāl; • • •
Digital edition of SII 3.153 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
